text:
If you are like Ellen and you totally don't understand millennials, then this is the perfect video for you.

Miley Cyrus explains to Ellen exactly what the deal is with millennials, like why do they post food photos? Why do they look at their phones and not talk to each other? And what's up with the hot music festivals?

This video is such perfection.

Thanks for always delivering Ellen and Miley!





Get more from Sisanie here!
